title: Ksenija Lukich becomes ambassador for Korean beauty brand AHC
text:
It's one of Korea's most popular skincare brands, and a cult favourite with A-list celebrities like Anne Hathaway.

And now Ksenija Lukich will be the latest ambassador for the AHC brand, announcing her new role to Confidential on Saturday.

The 29-year-old revealed: 'This is my first big skincare campaign and to do it with such an incredible brand is a real honour.'

'I feel so lucky!' Ksenija Lukich (pictured) announced her 'first big skincare campaign' as ambassador for a cult Korean beauty brand AHC on Saturday

She added: 'I'm also off to Seoul next week to see the brand launch its first flagship store. I've been wanting to visit Korea for some time and I feel so lucky to be there with AHC.'

Korean beauty products have become all the rage in recent years, with cutting-edge products that are favourite with stars and influencers.

AHC is available exclusively at Myer, with affordable products ranging between the $50 and $80 range.

It comes after the The E! Australia host spoke out about her struggles with eczema.

'It becomes really difficult when you're a television presenter and you're on TV with eczema on your eyes,' she said, according to Beauticate.

'It's extremely difficult to cover because everything you use sinks into the dry areas and sort of flakes off. It's also uncomfortable putting makeup and product on top of dry, red skin.'

She added: 'I'm also off to Seoul next week to see the brand launch its first flagship store. I've been wanting to visit Korea for some time and I feel so lucky to be there with AHC'

Blemish-free: It comes after the The E! Australia host spoke out about her struggles with eczema and how making simple lifestyle changes helped improve her skin

She previously told Mamamia two of her favourite products to help minimise flare ups including Cetaphil's RestoraDerm Skin Restoring Body Wash.

'It's actually a body wash but it removes my makeup very well, it's super affordable and it works really well for me, it's really gentle,' she said.

Another product that she uses is the Trilogy Certified Organic Rosehip Oil.

'At night time, I like to be super hydrating on my skin. Rosehip is good for healing, and for my scarring from eczema. I go through it all the time,' she said.
